short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Complete your dream bucket list items by taking action.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dreamliner helps users actively complete their "Dreams" (bucket list items).  Create your Dreams to start Dreamlining today! Make sure you achieve what you want in life. On every new tab, a life clock (or a custom timer you can configure) appears reminding you to complete your active Dreams with a nice background.
